about.paragraph1: Fredra.61 project is an example of dynamic public self-organization, an example of those who strive to shape an atmosphere of their own. Together we’ve created a place like no other and today any citizen can see a new life-style format that is an example of free and open society.
about.paragraph2: Regardless of our future location, we will be working on the implementation of fresh, useful, and creative ideas for people.
about.paragraph3:
It’s your turn to join!
79005, Lviv, 6 Fredra str., ap. 1
fredra.61@gmail.com
+38 (063) 0745298
about.address: 79005, м, Львів, вул. О.Фредра, буд.6, кв.1

donation.paragraph1: Fredra.61 is an independent noncommercial project. The project which gives an opportunity to turn a hundred unique events into reality, introduces our city to thousands of visitors from Ukraine and abroad, and continuously invites proactive people to hold common efficient projects with.
donation.paragraph2: It’s a project for every single person who believes in a free self-actualization and an independent future. We exist owing to you and believe that together we can do better. We count on your support.

thank.par2: We have a long and interesting way ahead

privatbank.mfo: Bank #: 325321 (Львівська філія, ЗАХІДНЕ ГРУ ПАТ КБ "ПРИВАТБАНК", м. Львів)
